title: Emerald & Diamond Peacock Haaram - Mohana Mani Kantabharanam
materials: 22K Gold base intricately set with brilliant-cut diamonds and vivid green Emeralds. Features fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and enhanced gold hue. Emeralds are of AAA quality
exhibiting excellent clarity and vibrant color.
features: Inspired by traditional South Indian artistry, this Haaram showcases a magnificent peacock (Mayura) motif centerpiece, meticulously crafted with delicate diamond filigree. Alternating emerald and diamond floral design along the necklace. The central pendant features a cluster of diamonds surrounding a central emerald. The design is completed with emerald drop pendants.
colors: and emerald green. The rich gold complements the dazzling diamonds
while the emeralds provide a striking pop of color
creating a regal and harmonious palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and significant celebrations. Its exquisite design also makes it a showstopping piece for high-end parties and cultural events.
description: This Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a symbol of timeless elegance and cultural heritage. The impeccable craftsmanship, combined with the rarity and beauty of the emeralds and diamonds, makes it a treasured heirloom. The peacock motif represents beauty, prosperity, and auspicious beginnings, adding to its significance.
